txt.en: 'Ah, Bruidis sent you? There is no need for her to worry. The silence can be... stifling, at times, but all that matters is keeping troublemakers away from the beacon.\n\n'I have not encountered any issues so far. However...'

'Would you mind taking these food provisions to Halnith at Nendath? She's been quite vigilant about her guard duties, especially since dissenters have taken to lighting the beacons for their own purposes.\n\n'Still, she must feel lonely. I'm sure she would welcome these provisions, as well as your company.'
Guard duty can be a lonely job.
Bruidis has asked you to check on Halnith.\n\nHalnith guards the beacon Nendath, which stands to the east of Tadrent.
